OOC: Finally, I was wondering when they'd come back to reality.

::Cygnar::
       He looks warily at the newly formed Hydras.  He slowly comes out into 
the open to stand in front of Hydras.  He looks up at him and stares.  "No.  
You ask us to give up our weapons and join forces with our so called enemy.  
I say NO!  I cannot and will not allow you to dissolve your own army.  Even 
if it costs me my life.  I WILL NOT SUBMIT!!!"  He backs up a few steps.  
"WHO IS WITH ME?  WHO HERE BELIEVES IN WHAT THEY WERE FIGHTING FOR?  WHO HERE 
HAS THE COURAGE TO SAY NO?"  He backs up a few more steps and braces himself.

--part1_15e.13f1b750.2ab7ca0b_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
